articles.title: Shia LaBeouf’s Mardi Gras Bar Crawl: “He’s Terrorizing the City” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The mercurial actor, allegedly sober for years, has been letting loose for nearly a week in New Orleans in the lead-up to Fat Tuesday.

articles.title: Anderson Cooper is leaving ‘60 Minutes’ after two decades - The Washington Post
articles.description: Anderson Cooper departs ’60 Minutes’ amid a new evolution at CBS News under editor in chief Bari Weiss.

articles.title: 'Tell Me Lies' Meaghan Oppenheimer On Why Season 3 Is The End - Deadline
articles.description: 'Tell Me Lies' Is Over! Showrunner Meaghan Oppenheimer Says Season 3 Is The Last, Why It Had To End And What's Next

articles.title: James Van Der Beek's friend slams critics of family's GoFundMe: 'You have no idea what they endured' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: James Van Der Beek's friend Mehcad Brooks slammed critics of the family's GoFundMe with a powerful message on social media: 'It's ok to stfu.'

articles.title: Quinton Aaron Focused on Recovery, Sad 'Wife' Is Married to Another Man - TMZ
articles.description: Good news for Quinton Aaron ... the actor's family tells us he is making huge progress on his road to recovering from a spinal stroke, even though he'll be traveling that road without the woman who falsely claimed to be his wife.

articles.title: Ray J performs with bleeding eyes weeks after revealing he has months to live: 'Life on the line' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Singer Ray J performed a concert on Saturday with what appeared to be bleeding eyes and something taped to his chest, weeks after claiming he only has months to live: 'I'm putting my life on the line for this show!'

articles.title: Robert Duvall Remembered by Adam Sandler, Viola Davis and More - Variety
articles.description: Hollywood tributes are pouring out for Robert Duvall, who died on Monday at the age of 95.

articles.title: ‘America’s Next Top Model’ Netflix Doc: An On-Camera Sexual Assault, Tyra Banks Firing Her Cast, Miss J’s Stroke — and Everything Else We Learned - Variety
articles.description: 'Reality Check: Inside America’s Next Top Model,' a Netflix docuseries about 'ANTM,' drops on Feb. 16—Miss J's stroke, Blackface photoshoots and more.

articles.title: 'Wuthering Heights' Box Office Beats Expectations With $83 Million Globally - Variety
articles.description: "Wuthering Heights" debuted slightly above expectations with $83 million in global ticket sales.
